ddm.factory.classifiers

Class ClassifierInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddm.factory.classifiers.ClassifierInstance
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    J48DecisionTreeClassifier, KNearestNeighbourClassifier, NeuronalNetworkClassifier

    public abstract class ClassifierInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    jordi Corbilla Abstract instance of a classifier. This class defines a generic class that will contain a Classifier algorithm.
